name: ctHideReports
description: Use this task to hide all the out of the box system reports
author: cloudThing Ltd
helpMarkDown: Specify the area in which the reports hidden and all system reports will have that area removed from their 'Visible In' setting.

inputs.name: targetOrg
inputs.label: Target Org Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: The full connection string for the target organisation where the reports are to be hidden. Ensure you use the 'RequireNewInstance' parameter!

inputs.name: hideIn
inputs.label: Hide in

options.Forms: Just Forms for related record types
options.Lists: Just Lists for related record types

inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the area where you want to hide the reports
